items.summary: Deploy the application to a fresh live instance while keeping the exact same configuration and content (no changes to source code, assets, canister logic, or user-facing text).
If the deployment fails after a successful build, retry deployment using the current build artifacts without rebuilding and without changing any app logic/content.
If retrying deployment fails with the same error, redeploy the last known successful build artifacts exactly as-is (no rebuild and no code changes).
If deployment still fails after retry and fallback redeploy attempts, capture and report the deployment failure details (error message and the step where it occurred) without making any code changes.
